entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
